overview: Ellie Goulding made her debut performance at Glastonbury on the John Peel Stage in 2010 and she returns this year to entertain revellers with her infectious electronic pop on The Other Stage.  The English singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist topped the esteemed BBC Sound Of poll in 2010 and since then she has gone on to perform at William and Kate’s Royal Wedding and at the White House.  Goulding’s music is a perfect balance between electro-pop and indie folk layered with distinctive breathy vocals. She won over the hearts of the nation with her smash cover of Elton John's Your Song and in 2013 championed the BBC’s Children in Need Charity with the Official single How Long Will I Love You. Expect a passionate, energetic performance on the Other Stage from one of the UK’s brightest stars.
title: Glastonbury 2014 Ellie Goulding
